1.content: your a small human in the pokemon world and afraid that you could be squashed like a bug in any second so you decide to keep moving. Where do you go?
1.title: Begining

choices: It was just a tree and some wind...
11.content:
You look around, confused.. Why is everything so big? Blades of grass and fallen leaves compared to you range from about four feet tall to towering way over your head! You rack your brains but you can't seem to remember anything before now... Looking around, you can see massive bushes and trees as far as the eye can see, you realize that you're in a forest.

You suddenly hear rustling and notice that there is a humongous shadow towering over you, prepared for the worst you turn around to see...
11.title: The Forest.

choices: Ninetales sits up and you fall off
The Ninetales notices you! Time for some more squashing....
113.content: You turn around to the shadow looming over you and stare at a giant Ninetales standing before you, with its giant rump pointed in your direction. Its tails gently float in the breeze revealing more of its juicy plot, before it starts to descend on you. Immediately you turn and make a run for it, but couldn't run fast enough and soon -SCRUNCH- its left butt cheek smushes you. The Ninetales sighed and stared at the leaves floating by and felt a lump under its cheek and ground its plump butt down, completely unaware of your presence. Your body is flattened further by the grinding and you yell out in pain. The giant Ninetales however, wasn't pleased with its work and gave several bounces to even it out. The bounces pulverized you to a pulpy flattened mess. When the pokemon was content, it settled its butt down with full weight causing you to groan as your body creates a delicious -SQUISH-. The relentless weight off the Ninetales completely flattened you under its booty....
113.title: A titanic Ninetales!

13.content:
You decide to adventure through the mountains, figuring most Rock Pokémon that live there are slow and you could easily run from them. As you trek along a beaten path you notice the lack of wild Pokémon, while you’re glad cuz that mean you can’t be squished it also unnerves you.

An ear splitting roar fills your ears and disorients you. As you’re trying to regain your senses a massive hand/claw comes down, snatching you up. You’re lifted high above the ground until you are eye level with the titanic Pokémon.
13.title: mountain

info.brief_description: A boy  finds himself lost in a pokemon world where everything can squash him like a bug.
info.description:
The story is centered around the pokemon universe where you (The human) Must wonder through the world filled with dangerous giant pokemon which can vary to 50 feet to 300 feet tall. Please dont make a big deal about your gender being male or female as this isnt a sexual Interactive story so no yiff.

Stomping and crushing is allowed, as well as any form of footplay but do keep in mind that the main character cannot be killed, he can be beaten and squashed like a pancake but cannot die.
